scripts.testnet: truffle migrate --network testnet --reset && truffle run verify LifeToken MasterChefV2 --network testnet
scripts.testnet-vlad: truffle migrate --f 3 --to 3 --network testnet --reset && truffle run verify VladToken --network testnet
scripts.mainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify LifeToken MasterChefV2 --network mainnet
